# API Surface: integrations

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| JiraClient | REST API Client | JIRA REST API v3 client supporting issue search (JQL), CRUD operations, status transitions, sprints, boards, components, and versions | jira/jira-client.ts |
| AdoClient | REST API Client | Azure DevOps REST API v7.0 client for projects, area paths, teams, and work items | ado/ado-client.ts (referenced) |
| JiraMapper | Bidirectional Mapper | Maps JIRA Epics/Stories/Sub-tasks to SpecWeave Increments/User Stories/Tasks with import/export/sync operations | jira/jira-mapper.ts |
| JiraIncrementalMapper | Granular Work Item Manager | Adds individual JIRA items (Story, Bug, Task) to existing increments or creates increments from cherry-picked items | jira/jira-incremental-mapper.ts |
| JiraDependencyLoader | Three-Tier Loader | Implements three-tier loading pattern: Tier 1 (metadata), Tier 2 (on-demand per-project), Tier 3 (bulk preload) | jira/jira-dependency-loader.ts |
| AdoDependencyLoader | Three-Tier Loader | ADO equivalent of three-tier loading with stricter rate limiting (200 req/hour) | ado/ado-dependency-loader.ts |
| AreaPathMapper | Hierarchy Mapper | Fetches and maps ADO area paths to SpecWeave project IDs with configurable granularity (top-level, two-level, full-tree) | ado/area-path-mapper.ts |
| FilterProcessor | Query Filter | Smart filtering for JIRA projects with presets (production, active-only, agile-only) and custom JQL support | jira/filter-processor.ts |
